name: brands_detail
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool consumer_reports.
Tool description: This API helps to query trusted ratings and reviews for the products, cars and services used every day to create a review site such as : consumerreports.org
API description: Fetch detailed information about a brand using the provided brand ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the brand to fetch details for. This value should be obtained from the brands `id` field returned in the `/search` endpoint or the `brandId` field returned in the `/products/list` or `/products/detail` endpoints.
